meanings.definition: To concern oneself with one's own business or affairs.
meanings.sent1: He decided to beeswax and not get involved in the argument.
meanings.sent2: She preferred to beeswax about her future plans quietly.
meanings.sent3: The beeswaxing neighbor peeked through the curtains to see what was happening.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like beeswax, sticking only to her own thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The beeswaxing businessman focused on his work, ignoring distractions.
